content.rendered:
Solaseed Air, is a Japanese regional airline headquartered on the property of Miyazaki Airport in Miyazaki, Miyazaki Prefecture, Japan. It operates services mainly between Tokyo and destinations on the island of Kyushu. The airline was established as “Pan Asia Airlines” in 1997 as the fourth airline established in a deregulated Japanese market. In August 1998, the airline’s corporate name was changed to “Skynet Asia Airways Co., Ltd.” before operations commenced in July 2002. The airline rebranded as “Solaseed Air” in July 2011, and the change of its legal corporate name to “Solaseed Air Inc.” followed in December 2015.

 

Verified & Updated on: 15/07/21

Solaseed Air in Miyazaki, Japan Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Miyazaki Airport, Miyazaki, Japan

Solaseed Air Reservation and Information Center

Toll Number:0570-037-283
When Calling from Outside Japan:+81-(0)6-7637-8817

Working hours: 08:00 to 20:00, 365 days a year.

Email: NA

Help Desk for Customers with Physical Disabilities

Phone: 0120-029-377
Toll Number:0570-029-377

FAX: 0120-029-366

Working hours: 09:00 to 17:00, 365 days a year.

Solaseed Air Official website: https://www.solaseedair.jp/en/

Solaseed Air Online Check-in: www.solaseedair.jp/en/service/checkin/

Note: Online check-in is available 20 Minutes prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Solaseed Air schedule here: www.solaseedair.jp/en/timetable/

Check Solaseed Air flight status here: www.solaseedair.jp/en/prospect/

Solaseed Air Baggage Allowance

View Solaseed Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Solaseed Air

Total fleet: 14

  • Boeing 737-800

Special Assistance in Solaseed Air

Traveling while Pregnant in Solaseed Air

  • Pregnant women (with due dates within 28 days of their travel date)

For more details: https://www.solaseedair.jp/en/service/assist/

Queries handled by Solaseed Air Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Solaseed Smile Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Solaseed Air in Miyazaki, Japan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
